text: Salesforce's CRM platform is indispensable for our sales team
the cost of add-ons quickly spirals out of control
Their customer support for a minor billing issue was absolutely abysmal.
Took different transfers and two weeks to resolve.
Zoom's video quality is excellent, even with a large number of participants.
The meeting management features are intuitive.
HubSpot's marketing automation tools are powerful
the learning curve for a small team is much steeper than advertised
N-iX delivered our custom mobile app ahead of schedule
